label: 北野社
本: The Clear Mirror:  A Chronicle of Japanese Court During the Kamakura Period, (1185-1333) . Stanford University Press . 1998
説明文: Northwest of the capital (now in Kamikyō-ku [Kamigyō-ku] [MS]). Dedicated to the spirit of the exiled statesman Sugiwara Michizane [Sugawara Michizane] [MS] (845-903). [菅原道真]
